content.rendered:
Jagrut Rathod Joined Regent Group in 2020. An experienced support analyst with the 8 years of experience. He holds the MCSA Qualification. Prior to Regent group he has worked as a technical support analyst. He has a passion for computing and in particular technical support, cloud computing, office 365 and networking.
Key responsibilities
• Providing technical support to the Regent Staff and Consumers via Phone, email or face to face
• Managing the configuring hardware and software
• Asset management
• Office 365 and MS Teams support
• Managing the service desk system
